Question.Subject: How can I attract more followers on blogspot?
Question.Content: I write a poker blog that I update every week or so and was wondering how can I tag it with key words or phrases to attract more followers? Any suggestions would be great!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Send me a link to your site and I'll check it out.
But generally, speaking...
SEO traffic exchanges Growing your link base Getting your articles marked by users in social media promote through Twitter and other social media
are good places to start.
Thanks, www.diamondbonus.com
